product_name: Terry Coolweather Bike Tights - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: The women's Terry Coldweather Bike Tights in plus sizes are the perfect antidote for cold weather riding. Fabric blend wicks moisture away from skin, sending it to outer face for quick evaporation to keep you warm, dry and comfortable. With its own built-in temperature regulator, fabric prevents you from heating up or cooling down too quickly, thus helping reduce fatigue. Flex-Air chamois features a 4-way stretch and multilevels of foam densities to provide needed padding in key areas. Covered with a soft moisture-wicking microfiber, foam pad is completely perforated for unbelievable ventilation. 8-panel construction with flatlock seams reduces abrasion, bolsters muscle support and ensures a streamlined look and feel. For a comfortable fit, mid-rise waistband fall just below your belly button. Terry Coldweather tights have woven ankle grippers to keep them comfortably in place.
short_description: The women's Terry Coldweather Bike Tights in plus sizes are the perfect antidote for cold weather riding.
